display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Non-Supine): (Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep in non-supine from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]. will be missing if no time non-supine or low position sensor quality.
calculation: 60*(hrop4 +   hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4 + marop4 + manrop4)/(remepop+nremepop)
